practice_phrases: However much I argued.
无论我争论多少。
However much I argued, I can see.
无论我争论多少，我能看到。
However much I argued, she told me to leave.
无论我争论多少，她告诉我离开。
However much I argued, I saw the mountains.
无论我争论多少，我看到山。
However much I argued, I wanted to leave home.
无论我争论多少，我想离开家。
However much I argued, she followed me to the shops.
无论我争论多少，她跟着我到商店。
However much I argued, I just saw the last bus leaving.
无论我争论多少，我刚看到最后一班公交车离开。
However much I argued, every morning I wake up and see mountains.
无论我争论多少，每天早上我醒来看到山。
However much I argued, she used to always insist we leave home.
无论我争论多少，她过去总是坚持我们离开家。
However much I argued I still had to share.
无论我争论多少，我还是要分享。
I argued.
我争论。
I argued so I left.
我争论所以我离开。
She told me I argued too much.
她告诉我我争论太多。
I argued and she followed me.
我争论她跟着我。
I argued but I still wanted to leave.
我争论但我还是想离开。
Every morning I argued about the eggs.
每天早上我争论鸡蛋。
I argued so much she told me to leave home.
我争论太多她告诉我离开家。
However much I argued, she used to always insist on eggs for supper.
无论我争论多少，她过去总是坚持晚饭吃鸡蛋。
I argued but she still insisted we have eggs every morning.
我争论但她还是坚持我们每天早上吃鸡蛋。
I argued and just saw her leave along the main road.
我争论刚看到她沿着主路离开。
I still had to share.
我还是要分享。
I can see I still had to share.
我能看到我还是要分享。
She told me I still had to share.
她告诉我我还是要分享。
I argued but I still had to share.
我争论但我还是要分享。

我想离开但我还是要分享。
Every morning I wake up and I still had to share.
每天早上我醒来我还是要分享。
However much I argued, I still had to share the eggs.
无论我争论多少，我还是要分享鸡蛋。
She used to always insist I still had to share my toys.
她过去总是坚持我还是要分享我的玩具。
I saw the mountains from my bedroom window but I still had to share.
我从我的卧室窗户看到山但我还是要分享。

还是要分享。

她过去总是坚持我还是要分享我的玩具在家。
